mapper.select: select a.applicants_num as applicantsNum, a.party_num as partyNum, m.nick_name as userName, a.comments, a.status, m.num as userNum from applicants a join member m on (a.user_num = m.num) where a.party_num=#{partyNum} and a.status=#{status}
mapper.insert: insert into applicants(applicants_num, party_num, user_num, comments, status) values(app_sequence.nextval, #{partyNum}, #{userNum}, #{comments}, #{status})
mapper.update: update applicants set status=1 where applicants_num = #{applicantsNum}
update applicants set status=2 where applicants_num = #{applicantsNum}
